message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it has immense value and I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with the product's performance.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm very interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not quite ready to accept $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $925000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it will bring to your business.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $875000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value I see in the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. However, I'm still not comfortable with $875000. I'm willing to make another adjustment and offer the product to you for $900000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and my costs.

I understand your position, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer $880000. I think this is the best we can both agree on, considering the value of the product and my financial constraints.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to find a mutually beneficial agreement. However, I'm still not comfortable with $880000. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and offer the product to you for $915000. This is the highest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and my costs.

I understand that you're willing to make one more adjustment, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $915000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $890000. I think this is the best we can both agree on, considering the value of the product and my financial constraints.

I understand that we're getting close, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with $890000. I'm willing to make one final adjustment and offer the product to you for $912500. This is the absolute highest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and my costs.

I appreciate your willingness to make one final adjustment, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $912500. I'm willing to make one last offer and propose $885000. If this is not acceptable, I'll have to consider buying the product from John for $1200000.
